scripts.dev:all: mkdir -p dev-server-logs && npx prisma dev > /dev/null 2>&1 & PRISMA_PID=$! && sleep 2 && nohup npm run dev > dev-server-logs/server-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).log 2>&1 & NEXT_PID=$! && echo $NEXT_PID > dev-server-logs/server.pid && echo "Started: Prisma (PID: $PRISMA_PID) + Next.js (PID: $NEXT_PID)"
scripts.dev:all:ngrok: npm run dev:all && npm run ngrok:background && echo '\nBoth servers + ngrok started!'
scripts.ngrok:background: mkdir -p ngrok-logs && nohup ngrok http 3000 > ngrok-logs/ngrok-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).log 2>&1 & NGROK_PID=$! && echo $NGROK_PID > ngrok-logs/ngrok.pid && sleep 3 && cat ngrok-logs/ngrok-$(ls -t ngrok-logs/ngrok-*.log | head -1) | grep -oP 'https://[^ ]*' | head -1 | tr -d '\n'
scripts.ngrok:url: cat ngrok-logs/ngrok-$(ls -t ngrok-logs/ngrok-*.log | head -1) 2>/dev/null | grep -oP 'https://[^ ]*' | head -1
scripts.ngrok:stop: if [ -f ngrok-logs/ngrok.pid ]; then kill $(cat ngrok-logs/ngrok.pid) 2>/dev/null; rm ngrok-logs/ngrok.pid && echo 'Ngrok stopped'; else echo 'No ngrok PID found'; fi
scripts.dev:stop: npm run dev:stop && npm run ngrok:stop && echo 'All services stopped'
scripts.dev:status: echo '=== SERVER STATUS ===' && npm run dev:status && echo '' && echo '=== NGROK STATUS ===' && if [ -f ngrok-logs/ngrok.pid ]; then NGROK_PID=$(cat ngrok-logs/ngrok.pid); if ps -p $NGROK_PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then echo "Ngrok running (PID: $NGROK_PID)"; npm run ngrok:url; else echo "Ngrok PID exists but not running. Stale PID?"; rm ngrok-logs/ngrok.pid; fi; else echo "Ngrok is not running"; fi
